upgrade_unlockFooter_desc: Adds an information bar to the game's footer.
ach_minigame1_desc: Earn points in a minigame for the first time.
upgrade_branding_desc: You know what's the game title?
upgrade_unlockBuildings_desc: Unlocks the ability to purchase buildings that generate points per second (CPS).
upgrade_floatingNumbers_desc: Shows floating numbers when you click.
upgrade_fancyButton_desc: Gives the main button a nicer look and a click animation.
upgrade_strongerClicks1_desc: Increases the value of each click by 1.
upgrade_spinningCursors_desc: Adds spinning cursors around the main button for a fun visual effect.
upgrade_fancyShopItems_desc: Improves the appearance of all items in the shop.
upgrade_unlockSounds_desc: Unlocks sound effects for clicks and upgrades.
upgrade_unlockLanguages_desc: Unlocks the language selection menu in the corner of the screen.
upgrade_unlockMinigame1_desc: Unlocks a new minigame! Maybe you'll get extra points :)
upgrade_unlockStats_desc: Unlocks a screen with detailed statistics of your progress.
upgrade_unlockAchievements_desc: Unlocks the Achievements screen to display your accomplishments.
upgrade_unlockBuffs_desc: Unlocks a panel with temporary buffs that can be activated.
minigame_reaction_desc: Click the bug as many times as you can in {{timeLeft}} seconds.
